verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How can it be that I should gain
Entrance into your holy place
But by your hands, your feet, your sacrifice
humbly I kneel bow before your throne
Boldly I before your throne

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Joining all the angels as they sing your praise
Holy Holy to the King of Kings
Now hands and hearts to you we raise
Holy Holy are you Lord
